summary_en: Significant changes are occurring in the Bitcoin market as Jane Street, a prominent Wall Street firm, is being sued in connection with the Terra Luna collapse. Notably, for the first time in a full trading day, Bitcoin trading occurred without a motivated seller, raising speculation about a reduction in selling pressure. Current price fluctuations continue to be daily occurrences, but the overall trend remains bearish. As observed in past cycles, a significant reversal is unlikely to occur this year amidst the bearish mid-market phase. Retail traders tend to rely on impulsive strategies when making decisions. With substantial market manipulations, the risks are exceedingly high even if a reversal would occur. A brief rally is likely in the coming weeks, supported by the historical performance of previous cycles.

Els≈ë alkalom, hogy a Bitcoin keresked√©s √∂szt√∂nz√∂tt elad√≥ n√©lk√ºl zajlott.
A tendencia tov√°bbra is bearish, a v√°rhat√≥ fordulat nem id√©n k√∂vetkezik be.
key_points_en: Jane Street's legal action regarding Terra Luna.
First time Bitcoin trading occurred without a motivated seller.
The trend remains bearish, significant reversal unlikely this year.
